title: "Simple Linear Regression Quiz"
author: "Haley Uyeunten"
date: '2022-04-21'
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
cars <- read_csv("mtcars5.csv")
```

```{r}
fit_cars <- lm(mpg ~ wt, data = cars)
summary(fit_cars)$coefficients
```


1. The estimated intercept coefficient is 35.91.
2. The estimated slope coefficient is -4.92.
3. Yes, the estimated slope coefficient is significant because the p-value is 6.04e-10, which is smaller than 0.05.
